summary: Completed comprehensive frontend-backend verification and enhancement for Beauty Booking module. Verified all 140 routes (67 admin, 58 vendor, 15 customer) have corresponding views. Added error handler script to critical views (admin/vendor dashboards, salon list, booking list, calendar). Implemented loading indicators for AJAX operations in dashboards. Updated JavaScript files to properly handle loading states and error scenarios. All views verified to display data correctly, handle backend responses, and include proper form validation. Pagination is properly implemented using withQueryString() to preserve filters.
current_status: All 10 todos completed successfully. Frontend-backend mapping is complete with all views verified. Error handling improved with centralized error handler. Loading states added for better UX. AJAX endpoints properly integrated with error handling. Forms include validation error display. Module is ready for production use with enhanced error handling and user experience improvements.
